page.title: 07SCHOOL EVENTS
page.content: Here are some events that have taken place this term.The girls played the mums at Rounders.The girls beat the mums many times including this year.The boys played the dads at football.Dads won 6-3.We have an open evening.This is when the parents come to talk to the teacher about their childs work.We had our Pingle Party or Summer fete.This is organised by the parents to raise money for school.We have an educational evening when the parents see what sort of things are taught in school.Our school play this year was called 'Carrots'.It was about DR.BARNADO.We had a sports day where all the children took part in 14 games.We have a barbeque.There is a marquee with disco lights, hotdogs and jacket spuds.We have a leavers service at church.The leavers receive a bible and are wished good luck .
